paper_abstract: In this paper, we show that free algebras in the variety of residuated lattices and some of its subvarieties are directly indecomposable and show, as a consequence, the direct indecomposability of free algebras for some classes of their bounded implicative subreducts.
paper_title: Indecomposability of free algebras in some subvarieties of residuated lattices and their bounded subreducts
